import React from 'react' import closer from '../img/icons/closer' export default class AuthForm extends React.Component { constructor() { super() this.state={ login: '', password: '', } this.handlerLink = this.handlerLink.bind(this) this.handlerChangeText = this.handlerChangeText.bind(this) } handlerLink(evt) { evt.preventDefault() this.props.setFormType(evt.target.getAttribute('data-type')) } handlerChangeText(evt) { evt.target.className === 'login__input' ? this.setState({login: evt.target.value}) : this.setState({password: evt.target.value}) } render() { return (
